mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (res_price, res_name, check_in, check_out, res_people_num, place_id, user_id, room_id, res_message) VALUES (#{res_price}, #{res_name}, #{check_in}, #{check_out}, #{res_people_num}, #{place_id}, #{user_id}, #{room_id}, #{res_message})
mapper.delete: delete from reservation where id not in (select res_id from payment)
mapper.select: select r.* from reservation r join payment p on r.res_id = p.res_id where p.payment_id = #{orderId}

SELECT r.res_id, p.place_nm, p.place_in, p.place_out, r.res_cancel_yn, ro.room_name, r.check_in, r.check_out, r.res_people_num, r.res_name, py.amount, py.createdAt FROM reservation r INNER JOIN place p ON r.place_id = p.place_id INNER JOIN room ro ON r.room_id = ro.room_id LEFT JOIN payment py ON r.res_id = py.res_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.res_id in (select res_id from payment where paymentKey is not null)
